pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Live Colour Ultra Brights Watermelon Burst
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Schwarzkopf Ultra Bright's Live Colour Semi-Permanent Watermelon Burst with maximum intensity.

Expres your colour creativity.

#Fullhead. #Ombre. #Highlights.

Re-create the latest trends and achieve stunning bright colours with Schwarzkopf Live Colour Ultra Bright's. The bold colours with built-in electrifying pigments deliver maximum intensity and vibrancy.

Change your hair colour as often as you like with Schwarzkopf Live Colour!

Gentle conditioning colour.

- Enriched with a colour mask that adds superior condition and shine.

- Gentle formula contains no peroxide or ammonia.

- Will not lighten hair.

- Lasts up to 6 to 8 washes. 

8 washes.

Boxed Contents: 30mL Colour creme, Instruction leaflet, Gloves.

Size: 1 Pack

Warnings

This product contains ingredients which may cause skin irritation to certain individuals. A preliminary test according to the accompanying directions should be made before use. This product must not be used for dyeing eyelashes or eyebrows to do so may be injurious to the eye. Repeated exposure may cause sensitization.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

This table is a guide only, a strand test is recommended. On highlighted, bleached or streaked hair applying Live Colour may result in a more vibrant colour that may last longer than 8 washes. The darker your natural hair colour the less vibrant the result will be.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

For advice, contact a Poisons Information Centre (Phone Australia 13 11 26; New Zealand 0800 764 766) or a doctor. If in eyes, wash out immediately with water.

Ingredients

Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Coconut Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Disodium Cocoamphodipropionate, Methylparaben, Parfum, Polyquaternium-6, Propylparaben, Etidronic Acid, Basic Red 51, Ethanolamine, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Basic Orange 31.

Directions

See package insert.

USAGE ADVICE

Quick & easy to apply.
- Shampoo and towel dry hair.
- Apply colour and leave on for 5 to 30 minutes.
- Rinse thoroughly and style as usual.
- For long or thick hair we recommend using two or more packs.
